Colophon

This site is produced using a few simple tools:

  • The site is written in markdown using iA Writer
  • Content is managed/versioned using git and GitHub
  • The site is generated using Jekyll and hosted on Heroku
  • Most of the photos on the site are shot on a Nikon D80 or Nikon N70 and hosted on Flickr

The website is set in two fonts; Droid Serif for body text and navigation, Nimbus Sans for headings. Both of these fonts were carefully chosen using Typecast and are served by Typekit.
